developments.description: Net interest margin expanded to 3.31% (+4 bps q/q); efficiency ratio improved to 41.8%; diluted EPS $1.13.
developments.context: Allowance for credit losses lifted to $196.5M (0.98% of loans) with $28.7M provision; management repurchased 1.07M shares at $46.81 average.

developments.impact: Monitor for loan growth, NIM guidance, CRE updates

developments.description: CATY closed at $47.00, down from 52-week high $55.29
developments.context: Pullback reflects broader regional bank sector weakness
